showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // {Vincent}
“This body is…
the punishment that's been given to me…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // {Vincent}
“I was unable…
to stop Professor Gast and Hojo…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // {Vincent}
“And Lucrecia…I was
unable to stop them…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // {Vincent}
“All that I was able to do
was watch…
That is my punishment…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:0}); // I'm against it!!
Why experiment on humans!?
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:1}); // She and I are both scientists!!

dialogStrings:
I'm against it!!
Why experiment on humans!?
She and I are both scientists!!

{Vincent}
“This body is…
the punishment that's been given to me…”

{Vincent}
“I was unable…
to stop Professor Gast and Hojo…”

{Vincent}
“And Lucrecia…I was
unable to stop them…”

{Vincent}
“All that I was able to do
was watch…
That is my punishment…”
